TopicTitle: Why can't I access the dev posts?

Articles.Content:
My old account was created two months ago, so it got deleted and I had to create a new one. I confirmed my account and have commented a lot since the forums came back from the kraken plague. At the beginning I received the usual "Your comment is pending for moderation", but now my comments are posted immediately. The problem here is that I'm getting this message:

astropapi1, you do not have permission to access this page. This could be due to one of several reasons:

-Your user account may not have sufficient privileges to access this page. Are you trying to edit someone else's post, access administrative features or some

other privileged system?

-If you are trying to post, the administrator may have disabled your account, or it may be awaiting activation.

I know my account is activated, and my account isn't disabled, So... What's the problem?

Now I can, nevermind... Mods, could you please delete this thread? It's useless now.

Edited August 20, 2013 by astropapi1
